topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e18cf2636872497f5e0f00#post_54e18cf2636872497f5e0f00
I read it out of curiosity as a kid.
The funny thing about the Bible is, a lot of the peace, love, and unity stuff was in the new testament. The OLD Testament was basically a Death Metal album. Angels coming to Earth and fucking people and having babbies. Fire, brimstone, death, carnage, it's in there!
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e18cf2636872497f5e0f00#post_54e18cf2636872497f5e0f00
There's some crazy badass stories in there.  
I've always felt like a legit adaptation of religious texts would make for an amazing movie series. None of this Noah bullshit where they just put in a bunch of crap to make it look cool. There's already badass shit.
